wikipedia_page.main: George Bertram (15 January 1896 – April 1963) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Fulham, Brentford and Rotherham County as a forward or half back.

response: *George Bertram (footballer, born 1896), (1896–1963), English footballer for Fulham, Brentford
